name: An Rúibín
description:
Au Ruíbín tells the story of Rosie, a young girl who finds herself trapped within a house she has no recollection of, and with her memory completely wiped. Upon learning that the entrance is locked, she starts a search to find out what's really going on, uncovering something more mysterious than she had initially anticipated.

Au Ruíbín is made in honor of the JRPG genre, and is heavily based on the classics Mad Father and The Witch's House. I grew up with these games, and I really appreciate the entertainment they provided.

CREDITS

I (Titanelie/Maja Bjørnaas Hoem), am:

  • Programmer
  • Designer
  • Artist (Pixel Art)

The sound effects do not belong to me.

This game is in early development, with only its first iteration being released. The current build is merely a bare-bones prototypes of basic mechanics, and contains no formal story beats.
